name: Clarion Hotel Stockholm
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Stockholm in Stockholm, SE near the Royal Opera, Casino Cosmopol and the Stockholm Globe Arena. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free Internet access, a spa, a restaurant and an indoor pool. All guest rooms have free wireless high-speed Internet and flat-screen TVs with free movie and sports channels. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Stockholm. There is 24-hour room service and valet parking available. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK/stay per pet.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza
description: This hotel is housed in an impressive 1880s building opposite Humlegården Park and the National Library of Sweden. It offers a quality gourmet restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza’s rooms feature colourful modern décor, cable TV and fresh bathrooms with free toiletries. Some rooms include a seating area. The award-winning Vassa Eggen Steak House uses top-class Swedish beef, lamb and pork. The minimalist interior design creates a Manhattan-style fine dining setting. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. Guests can also book the hotel sauna. Elite Stockholm Plaza’s central location provides easy access to shopping and clubbing at trendy Stureplan. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Clarion Hotel Sign
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sign in Stockholm, SE near the Stockholm Central Station and the Arlanda Express train to Arlanda Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, an outdoor heated pool and more. All guest rooms have air cooling units and come equipped with hair dryers and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Sign. Pet charge: 200 KR/stay per pet. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Hôtel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Stockholm. A short walk from Stockholm Palace, it offers modern rooms equipped with free wireless internet access, a mini bar and a private bathroom. This historic hotel provides a number of facilities, including a plunge pool, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will enjoy the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt's 144 elegant rooms offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV, plus all the essentials required for a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Stockholm, with Stortorget Stockholm just a short stroll away. The Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are a 10-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Brommavik Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm's Bromma district, 5 minutes drive from Stockholm-Bromma Airport, this quiet hotel offers free Wi-Fi and parking. The modern, stylish rooms have a fridge and a flat-screen TV. The rooms of Brommavik Hotel feature a seating area, a tea/coffee maker and cable TV. Some include a private spa bath. Sundbyberg Station is a 5 minute walk from Hotel Brommavik, and the train ride to Stockholm Central Station takes just 10 minutes. In addition, the Solvalla Horse Racing Track is about 1 km away. The Hotel has a cozy sauna and relaxation room that can be booked for private sessions, and is included in the stay when booking the Superior, Luxury or Deluxe Family rooms. The Hotel offers access to a real fitness center with proper gym equipment.

name: Hotel Hellsten
description: This stylish hotel is located in Stockholm and is a few minutes on foot from Radmansgatan Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and 24-hour room service. This 4-star hotel provides a currency exchange, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Sauna and Fitness centre. The luxurious feel of each room at Hotel Hellsten is complemented by amenities such as flat-screen TVs. They boast an en suite bathroom where a bathroom telephone can be found. Hotel Hellsten is located in the heart of Stockholm’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Guests can also visit the National Library of Sweden, Royal Institute of Technology and Stureplan.Revato

name: Best Western Royal Star
description: Best Western Royal Star in Älvsjo is located a 10 minutes drive by car or train from Stockholm City Center. The bright and airy hotel have 103 spacious and tastefully decorated rooms, well suited for both conference guests as well as families with children. Our conference facilities are modern and can accommodate up to 90 participants in the biggest room. We also offer sauna, solarium and one of the biggest hotel fitness center in Stockholm. We offer free parking outside the hotel for our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Villa Dagmar
description: Set in Stockholm, 200 metres from Army Museum, Villa Dagmar offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Villa Dagmar features some units that feature a balcony, and each room has a coffee machine. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Dagmar include Stureplan, Sergels Torg Square and Vasa Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Downtown Camper by Scandic
description: Located less than a 10-minute walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Downtown Camper by Scandic offers guests an ideal base when in Stockholm. It is close to Kungstradgarden, eateries and shops. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. The comfortable rooms at Downtown Camper by Scandic include a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. All offer an en suite bathroom where a shower and a hair dryer can be found. The hotel houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day. A buffet breakfast is served each morning. Downtown Camper by Scandic is conveniently located for discovering Stockholm with Stockholm Palace within walking distance. Guests can also visit the National Library of Sweden, Stortorget Stockholm and Stockholm City Hall.Revato

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Scandic Anglais
description: Around the corner from the Stureplan entertainment district, this hotel is located in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm neighbourhood. Enjoy the pulse of the city and all sorts of conversations at the popular hotel lounge, Bar Anglais. During warmer month, the crowd expands to the 7th-floor rooftop bar to take in pleasing city views with a drink in hand. All rooms at Scandic Anglais have a flat-screen TV with a variety of cable channels and modern décor. Free WiFi is available throughout the building. Guests can keep up fitness routines in the well-equipped gym and two saunas provide relaxation options. The hotel Bar Anglais, offers guests music every day of the week and a classic hotel bar menu with carefully selected dishes and beverage. Guests can enjoy energising breakfast options, 24-hour Fairtrade coffee and classic Scandinavian dishes made from fresh and organic-sourced ingredients. The staff will gladly help cater to any diet restrictions requested. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is 300 metres away, just 2 stops from Stockholm’s Old Town. Guests are welcome to borrow the hotel bicycles to explore the city.

name: Hotel Diplomat
description: Set in an impressive 1911-era Art Nouveau building on upscale Strandvägen boulevard, Hotel Diplomat offers great views over Nybroviken Bay, spa and fitness room access and a restaurant with summer terrace. WiFi is free. Diplomat’s modern interior was designed by renowned architect Per Öberg and combines classic elegance with contemporary design. Each room features blackout curtains, a generous workspace and quality Dux beds with premium linen. All include luxury toiletries and a smart TV with Chromecast. The in-house restaurant uses fresh, local produce to create classic Swedish dishes with a Mediterranean twist. The waterfront terrace is an ideal spot to take in the waterfront views during summer. Guests can enjoy a glass of champagne or cocktail in the bar after a day exploring Stockholm. For relaxation or fitness needs, the hotel has a spacious, well-equipped gym and a sauna. The Diplomat is just 300 metres from Stockholm’s Royal Theatre. Local buses stops directly outside the hotel. Archipelago-bound boats depart regularly from across the street.

name: Elite Palace Hotel
description: Centrally situated in Stockholm’s Vasastan neighbourhood, this hotel is 5 minutes’ walk to St. Eriksplan Metro Station. It offers free WiFi and an on-site British restaurant and pub. Elite Palace Hotel’s modern rooms all feature cable TV, a minibar, along with a work desk and seating area. The on-site Bishop’s Arms pub offers an à la carte lunch and dinner menu of international favourites, together with an extensive selection of beer and whiskey. Elite Palace’s popular breakfast buffet is served in a separate dining room. The on-site Vana spa and gym are available for an extra surcharge. It features a hot tub, steam and dry sauna, aroma room, signature treatments and a lounge with a fireplace. The large modern gym offers personal training opportunities. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Hotel staff can recommend many of the nearby restaurants and attractions. The Arlanda Airport Bus Stop is only 450 metres away from the Elite Palace Hotel.

name: Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection, located on the fashionable Standvagen, an extraordinary 4 Star hotel that many call their second home. Within a comfortable walking distance from cultural attractions, shopping, first-class restaurants, the archipelago and round-trip boats, this beautiful boutique hotel stand with pride.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Best Western Plus Park City Hammarby Sjostad
description: Located in the Hammarby Sjöstad district, this hotel is 5 km from central Stockholm and 200 metres from the Sickla Kaj train stop. It offers free access to Wi-Fi, a gym All guest rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Stockholm Hammarby Sjöstad have a work desk, flat-screen TV and safe. Some also include a seating area. Just across the street from Park Inn is the Hammarbybacken ski slope. During summer, guests might enjoy a walk along the nearby Sickla Canal and Hammarby Lake. Stockholm Central Station is within 10 minutes' drive of Park Inn Hammarby Sjöstad. Ericsson Globe Arena and Tele2 Arena are both only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Lady Hamilton Hotel
description: This charming hotel is housed in a listed 15th-century building, right next to the Royal Palace in Stockholm’s Old Town. Gamla Stan Metro Station is 400 metres away. Guests can book private access to the on-site sauna and plunge pool. All rooms at Collector’s Lady Hamilton Hotel have cable TV and a private bathroom with eco-friendly toiletries. For added historic feel, most rooms feature old paintings, antique furniture and crystal chandeliers. The hotel's 13th-century cellar well is now used as a relaxing area with a sauna. The in-house Bistro Emma serves afternoon tea during weekends from September through March. Staff at Collector’s Lady Hamilton will gladly recommend local shops, cafés and attractions such as the Nobel Museum. Stockholm Central Station is 1 metro stop away.

name: Victory Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm’s picturesque Old Town, Collector's Victory Hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Gamla Stan Metro Station. Its uniquely decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and heated bathroom floors. Inspired by its own maritime antique collection, the rooms at Collector’s Victory Hotel feature a naval theme. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant, Djuret, serves both meat and seafood dishes, using locally sourced and organic produce. Guest can also unwind with a drink in the cosy lounge bar Tweed, or visit the wine bar The Burgundy. Leisure options at Collector’s Victory include a sauna and a plunge pool.

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Clarion Grand Hotel
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand in Helsingborg, SE near the Karnan medieval tower, Kronborg Castle, Sofiero Castle, Fredriksdal open-air museum and the Lund University Campus Helsingborg. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a sauna, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have mini bars, desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Helsingborg hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK per stay. The hotel features a new hotel concept kitchen and table signed by top chef Marcus Samuelsson.Choice Hotels

name: Gothia Towers & Upper House
description: Welcome to Gothia Towers! The perfect choice for both business travellers and leisure guests. Here you can enjoy a wide range of facilities - all under one roof, next door to the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. In addition to hotel rooms you will find a flower shop, spa, café, restaurants, bars, conference rooms, banquet and exhibition halls. You will find a total of 1184 great rooms in all three of Gothia Towers’ imposing towers – with everything from that little something extra to a real touch of extravagance. Enjoy great comfort and tasteful décor and furnishings in our well-equipped double or family rooms. The majority of our rooms also boast wonderful views of the city. Gothia Towers is located in central Gothenburg, right in the thick of things on Korsvägen, just a couple of blocks from the main boulevard Avenyn. We are close to the city centre with excellent transport links, right next to Scandinavia's largest amusement park, Liseberg, Universeum science centre as well as concert and sport arenas like Scandinavium and Ullevi stadium. We offer several different restaurants and bars with everything from light meals in our café to modern à la carte dining. Come and enjoy breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Or why not drop in for a beer, a glass of wine or other beverages? We have something for all taste buds and every occasion. As a guest at Gothia Towers you have discounted access to Upper House Spa, with a protruding champagne pool, Gothenburg’s highest hammam, saunas, an experience shower and a relaxation suite, where you can enjoy and take in the incredible views. Gothia Towers has been designed for exciting meetings, and for planned meetings we offer both small and really large conference facilities. We have options to meet your requirements and can tailor a conference or meeting to suit your needs.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Post
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Post in Gothenburg, SE near Liseberg, Ullevi Stadium, Slottskogen and the Swedish Exhibition and Congress Center. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center, outdoor and indoor pools, meeting space and a convention center. All guest rooms have refrigerators, TVs and coffee makers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Plaza Hotel
description: Located in a stylish neo-classical building in central Gothenburg, Elite Plaza Hotel combines old-fashioned comfort with modern amenities. It offers free Wi-Fi and tastefully decorated rooms with LCD TVs. All comfortable rooms at The Elite Plaza are equipped with a minibar, cable TV and safe. The decór is a blend of international style and classic Scandinavian design. The atrium-style Swea Hof restaurant offers elegant gourmet dining based on local ingredients. Drinks can be enjoyed at the Plaza Bar and at the British-style The Bishop’s Arms pub. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00, except during peak periods. Guests can unwind in the relaxation area, complete with a sauna and a fully-equipped gym. The Swedish Exhibition and Congress Centre and the Liseberg Amusement Park is located an 8-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Gothenburg
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and provides easy access to nearby bars and eateries. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Hagabadet Spa & Yogastudio and Hotel Gym. This 4-star hotel offers valet parking, an express check-in and check-out feature and a kids club. Welcoming and helpful team members are available 24 hours a day. The luxurious feel of each room at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg is complemented by facilities like mini bars. They all offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg can wake up to a satisfying breakfast at Noot Nordik Kitchen, plus dinner at Radisson Blu Restaurant after a day of sightseeing. The hotel is ideally located for discovering Gothenburg with Gothenburg Cathedral within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Ullevi and Kungsportsavenyn.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel Gothenburg
description: Situated in Lindholmen, this hotel overlooks Gothenburg’s harbour and the Göta River. It features free WiFi, a wellness centre and a rooftop terrace with a spa pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel include a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and tea/coffee facilities. Some rooms overlook the river. Guests have free access to Radisson Blu Riverside’s wellness area with gym and sauna. Parking spaces are found in front of the hotel and in a parking garage next to the hotel. International dishes are served at Cuckoo's Nest Restaurant. A wide selection of drinks can be enjoyed in the bar or on the terrace during summer. Lindholmen Bus Stop and Lindholmspiren Ferry Stop are both 200 metres away, while Gothenburg Central Station is 2.5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Riverton
description: Hotel Riverton is a contemporary independent design hotel located centrally in Gothenburg by the waterfront which is fully family-owned and operated since 1991. With personal care and attention to detail in every aspect of our guests experience, we've integrated the feeling of comfort, charm, and style combined with excellent food and drink experiences.Explore our story from our rooftop bar and restaurant to our rejuvenating spa and the comforts of our bedrooms making us the perfect destination for those who love unfussy luxury. Beautifully situated by the harbour entrance in Gothenburg, Hotel Riverton is located in the city centre and within walking distance to the Opera, the Casino and the chic shopping scene of Kungsgatan, Avenyn, NK and Nordstan. The charming old town and the picturesque Haga district is within a short stroll.Lindholmen Science Centre is just a ferry ride over, from Stenpiren which is a hub for trams, ferries and bus services, located 250 m from the Hotel. In summer time we highly reccomend to take one of the summer boats departing from Stenprien which takes you out to the gorgeous archipelago of Gothenburg. Within the hotel, there are two restaurants and one lobby bar, including View Skybar & Restaurant which is home to spectacular panoramic views across the Gothenburg harbour. Enjoy one of our award-winning cocktails in the bar or experience our a la carte menu from the 12th floor. Give yourself a break and unwind in our new Serenity Spa when staying with us in Gothenburg. Enjoy the inviting atmosphere and recover in our indoor pool, aromatherapy, steam or dry sauna or relax at your own pace in our Spa Lounge. We also offer a brand-new gym with the latest cardio machines from Precor, free weights and cardio technology from Preva. Please note, the minimum age requirement to enter the Spa facilities is 18 years old, from 16 years old if accompanied an adult. *CASH FREE from 1st Januari 2017*iHotelier/iStay

name: Profilhotels Opera
description: This hotel is on Drottningtorget Square, 100 metres from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free gym access, free in-room WiFi, and Italian and American cuisine. Nordstan Shopping Centre is around the corner. ProfilHotels Opera’s rooms have modern bathrooms and include a hairdryer. Some also offer a 32-inch flat-screen TV, climate control and heated bathroom floors. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant that is open every day or have a cocktail at the bar. The indoor pool and two saunas can be used for an additional fee. The Nordstaden Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk away. Opera Hotel’s guests receive discounts at a nearby car park.

name: Elite Park Avenue Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is ideally located on Gothenburg’s main street, Avenyn, and directly across from the Landvetter Airport Bus Stop. It offers a popular restaurant, an English-style pub and free WiFi access. The Bishop’s Arms serves traditional pub fare from Monday to Saturday, and on Friday and Saturday guests can also eat in the onsite atPark Restaurant. All modern rooms at Elite Park Avenue Hotel feature climate control, a satellite TV and comfortable arm chairs. Free leisure options include a gym, 2 saunas and small relaxation pool. Massages and other treatments can be booked separately. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 10:30 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Elite Park Avenue is just 200 metres from Gothenburg Art Museum and the City Theatre. There are several private and public paid parking options available.

name: Avalon Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby bars and eateries. The hotel also provides a terrace on its roof equipped with a pool. This 4-star hotel offers porters, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Couples will adore the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All offer a flat-screen TV, a seating area and slippers. Guests staying at Avalon Hotel Gothenburg can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay nearby when looking for a bite to eat. Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is ideally situated for discovering Gothenburg with Kungsportsavenyn and Nordstan within a 10-minute walk. Gothenburg Cathedral is also only five minutes away.Revato

name: First Hotel G
description: The stylish First Hotel G is situated above Gothenburg Central Station, across from Nordstaden Shopping Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi, sauna and gym access and an elegant champagne bar. First G is a fashionable design hotel featuring original work by Italian artist Silvia Papas. Its quiet, modern rooms offer grand views of the city or the hotel’s inner courtyard. All rooms include tea/coffee facilities, heated bathroom floors and an LCD TV. The trendy Cristal Champagne Bar is a popular hangout for locals. Situated in the open lobby, G Mat & Vin’s à la carte menu combines quality Swedish produce and internationally inspired cuisine. Dishes include shrimp sandwiches, lobster soup and veal steaks. Gothenburg Opera House and Lilla Bommen Harbour are a 10-minute walk from First Hotel G.

name: Scandic Rubinen
description: Scandic Rubinen is conveniently located in the city centre and is only a few minutes from the Rohsska Museum. Just a 10 minute walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, the hotel provides guests with an ideal base while in Gothenburg. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore what the local nightlife has to offer. Scandic Rubinen Hotel offers rooms equipped with a hair dryer, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. During their stay at Scandic Rubinen Hotel Gothenburg, guests can enjoy a meal at Ruby Bar, which offers a menu including Mediterranean cuisine. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants are also available in close proximity to the property. Scandic Rubinen is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Gothenburg with Gothenburg Cathedral and Gotaplatsen within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit the Universeum and Ullevi.Revato

name: Scandic Crown
description: Located in central Gothenburg, this modern hotel is 4 minutes’ walk from Gothenburg Central Station. Nordstan Shopping Centre is 500 metres away. Free WiFi and city views from the top-floor relaxation centre are offered. Scandic Crown’s guest rooms all feature Nordic décor with wooden floors and light wood furnishings. Each room is equipped with a work desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s in-house restaurant, Kronan Bat & Matsalar, serves Mediterranean-inspired dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the contemporary bar while reading a book from its library. Scandic Crown guests have free access to a hot tub, 2 saunas and fitness centre. Bicycles can be rented on site to explore the area. Ullevi Arena is about a 10-minute walk away from Scandic Crown. Trädgårdsföreningen Park is also nearby, only 200 metres away.

name: Scandic Backadal
description: Scandic Backadal is located in Gothenburg and offers free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a playground. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, children's play area, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, an in-room closet and a private bathroom. There are also several rooms available for families. Serving international and local dishes, Scandic Backadal Hotel Gothenburg's relaxed restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those wishing to dine on site. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Hotel Backadal provides a convenient place to discover Gothenburg Cathedral and Liseberg, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa
description: CLOSE TO BOTH CITY & SEA - 15 minutes to Gothenburg City and close to Volvo Company headquarters, Arendal and the Ports of Gothenburg. With access to exclusive and indulgent experiences in a calm and tranquil world. Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa are exactly that. We have done our outmost to create a sanctuary, where it is great to just be. We offer you 149 comfortable, fully equipped and non-smoking guest rooms. 28 conference rooms with capacity and flexibility for 2-800 delegates and a high quality restaurant with excellent service. Art Garden Spa offers you an array of baths, saunas and activities at an additional charge. Children under 15 years are only allowed in the spa area during certain school holidays. The fitness gym is available to all guests, free of charge.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Heden, BW Signature Collection
description: This hotel is 500 metres from the Avenyn shopping street and 10 minutes’ walk from Liseberg Amusement Park. It offers free in-room WiFi, a free wellness centre. Hotell Heden’s rooms feature typical Scandinavian design and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Heden Hotell's fresh, wellness centre includes a gym and sauna. The lobby has a cosy fireplace area and a bar serving light meals. The Swedish Exhibition Centre is 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Scandic Kramer
description: Scandic Kramer offers elegant accommodation in Malmo and is within walking distance of Malmo Central Station. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all boast an en suite bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Kramer features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants nearby. The area surrounding Scandic Kramer Hotel Malmo is well-known for its shopping. Lund University and Malmo Arena are just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Triangeln
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Triangeln is an easy drive from Malmo Arena and provides public parking on site. It has a spa and wellness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. In-house dining options include Lean Grill & Bar, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. Scandic Triangeln is close to Triangeln Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Malmo and its surrounding areas. The local neighbourhood is also famous for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel
description: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel is located in the southwestern part of Malmo. Besides 395 guest rooms, we offer six rooms for meetings and events, a restaurant, a sports bar and a sky bar on the 15th floor. Free gym, sauna and Wi-Fi are included for all staying guests. The hotel is located 150 meters from the train station Malmo Hyllie where you can reach Malmo Center in three minutes, Kastrup in 12 minutes and Copenhagen Center in 25 minutes. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotel Royal
description: Welcome to the little hotel with personal service located in the heart of Malmo, The Best Western Hotel Royal. We are within a five-minute walk from the railway station, Malmo Casino, shopping, entertainment, sights, restaurants, and parks. The owner Bayram Altuntas along with the staff will do their best to make sure all your needs are met. The reception desk is open 24-hours. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Slottsbacken
description: Hotell Slottsbacken is just a few minutes’ walk from Visby’s main street, Adelsgatan. A minibar and a 32-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels are standard room features here, while WiFi is free throughout the premises. The fresh, modern guest rooms also include a desk, a seating area and a tiled bathroom with shower. Visby Ferry Terminal and the main square, Stora Torget, are within 10 minutes’ walk of Slottsbacken Hotell. The Medieval City Wall is 250 metres away.

name: Hotell Strandporten
description: Kalk Hotel is boutique hotel located on Strandgatan, in a beautiful building from the 17th century, carefully renovated with a stylish interior and Gotland details. There are 21 rooms, all of which offer lovely light, comfortable beds from Jensen and luxurious bathrooms with limestone details from Gotland. Some rooms have a balcony with a view of the city, the sea and the beautiful park Almedalen -Perfect for enjoying the first cup of coffee in the morning, a siesta after a lovely day in Visby or why not a glass of sparkling wine before dinner at one of the town's fantastic restaurants. Breakfast buffet: We want to give you the best possible start to the day which is why we spend some special love on our breakfast buffet. For us, sustainability is important and that there is something for everyone, even if you have an allergy or have a special diet. It does not prevent us from serving you a delicious breakfast with a healthy twist. Among the freshly baked breads you will find our homemade müsli and granola, energy shots and much more. The breakfast buffet is served weekdays 07:00 - 10:00 and holidays 08:00 - 11:00. During the summer always till 11:00. The entire hotel is non-smoking. The hotel does not accept cash payment. We are looking forward at having you as our guest. Warm welcome!

name: Novi Resort
description: Located by Norderstrand Beach, this property offers guest rooms and apartments in Visby and just 1 km from Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre. It offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a large terrace. NOVI Resort’s rooms feature modern décor, designer furniture and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All options have private patios or balconies with Baltic Sea views. Most have a kitchenette. Guest can hang out by the poolside or eat at NOVI's summer restaurant Grill & Bar between June and August. It offers light dishes, gourmet dining and great sea views. NOVI Resort is a 10-minute walk from Visby’s 13th-century city wall and Almedalen Park. Gotska Golf Course is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Best Western Strand Hotel
description: A first class hotel with a service minded staff and environmental certification. The hotel is located in the middle of the town, near the sea inside the city wall of the World Heritage town of Visby. Beautiful medieval houses and alleys in Visby surround the hotel. The Best Western Strand Hotel is the old Visby Brewery which became a hotel in 1982, from a family owned hotel with 13 rooms to one of the largest hotels in Visby today with 124 rooms and suites. Ferry and airport are within easy reach. Please note: Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 20 years of age if no parents are attending.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Etage
description: The pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Etage is a luxurious hotel, located minutes from exciting attractions like Lake Malaren, the third largest lake in Sweden. This hotel is also minutes from Malardalen University, Vasa Park, Turbine House and the Skrapan skyscraper, which houses the highest cocktail bar in Sweden. Enjoy hotel amenities such as meeting space, copy and fax machines, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free wireless Internet, a sauna and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms come with desks, hair dryers and TVs. Book with us today.Choice Hotels

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal
description: Explore the fascinating city of Stockholm from modern AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal. Our 4 star hotel is located in Solna, 10 minutes from Stockholm city center, and perfect for business meetings and events. It is strategically located near public transport and walking distance to Friends Arena, Arenastaden och Mall of Scandinavia. Our pet friendly hotel offers an urban, modern, high-style design for a feeling of harmony and creativity. Featuring 223 hotel rooms and suites, AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal also offers meeting rooms, a bar and restaurant PicPoc by Pontus Frithiof, and Viitalize Gym and Wellness. The conference center includes 3 multi-functional meeting rooms with the capacity to host 110 guests in the largest meeting room. The meeting rooms are all equipped with the latest technology, necessary equipment as well as hi-speed WiFi for a successful business event. Relax in our Nordic hotel spa and fitness center with saunas, pools, and treatments.Marriott

name: Clarion Hotel Gillet
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Gillet in Uppsala, SE near Uppsala University, Fyris River, Uppsala Botanical Garden, Uppsala Cathedral and Old Uppsala. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, two restaurants, an exercise room and sauna, copy services, conference facilities and an indoor heated pool. All guest rooms have TVs, coffee makers, desks and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Uppsala hotels like our Clarion Hotel Gillet. Pet charge, 250 kr per stay. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Grand Hotel Gävle
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 124 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including a health club and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a reception hall. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include limo/town car service, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Elite Grand Hotel Gävle places you in the heart of Gävle, within a 5-minute walk of Gavleborg County Museum and Old Town Gävle. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Stortorget and 0.6 mi (1 km) from Gavle Goat. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM. Optional Charges Self parking fee: SEK 120 per night Pet fee: SEK 200 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 5:30 AM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, and a first aid kit Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. The credit card used to book the reservation must be presented by the cardholder at check-in along with matching photo identification. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available LGBTQ friendly Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for lunch Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Electrostatic spray is used for disinfection Cashless transactions are available Contactless food service / room service is availableViajes Exito Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Sense
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sense in Lulea, SE near the COOP Arena, Kulturens Hus, World UNESCO Heritage Gammelstad and the Lulea Tekniska Universitetet. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, high-speed Internet and meeting space. All guest rooms have flat-screen TVs, desks, mini bars, pillow-top mattresses, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Some rooms feature robes. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Frösö Park Hotel
description: Located on the stunning island of Froson, the Hotel Froso Park, Ascend Hotel Collection, is surrounded by a golf course, as well as outdoor activities like running, cycling, hiking, skiing and snowmobiling. This pet-friendly hotel is also close to Ostersund and all the attractions you will want to check out on your trip, including Winter Park, Moose Garden and the Froso Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, a hot tub, meeting space, spa facilities, a dance floor, free breakfast, free weekday newspapers, free WiFi and an indoor and outdoor gym and fitness center, to name a few. Guest room amenities include desks and sofa sleepers. Ask about our suites and superior rooms. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Sundsvall
description: A top hotel in Sundsvall in a new part of the city, which is still very centrally located and also very close to the Selangers river. We are inspired by the Sundsvall stone town, and by the Medelpad landscape stone, the Alnoit and also by the contrast between the light and dark seasons. The hotel provides 270 rooms, restaurants, bars, rooftop terrace, spa and a large conference area.Choice Hotels

name: The Lamp Hotel Norrkoping
description: This boutique hotel is housed in a refurbished 18th-century building. Just 50 metres from Norrköping’s main street, Drottninggatan, it features and on-site spa, free WiFi internet access and garden in the summer time. The Lamp Hotel’s modern, guest rooms feature a comfortable seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar are also provided in each room. All bathrooms have underfloor heating and luxurious shower amenities from Babor. Housing Sweden’s largest floor lamp, The Lamp Restaurant serves Asian-Swedish Fusion dishes. In summer, meals can be taken out onto the garden. The Lamp Hotel & Spa is in the heart of central Norrköping. Norrköping Central Station is a 10-minute walk away from the hotel and the Louis De Geer Concert Hall & Congress Centre is 350 metres away. You will find shopping, restaurants and cafés just a few steps from the hotel.

name: Elite Hotel Knaust
description: Elite Hotel Knaust is located in a historic 19th century building in central Sundsvall, just 100 metres from Sundsvall Museum. It offers charming rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the rooms at the elegant Hotel Knaust have a safety deposit box, work desk and minibar. Many rooms include a seating area and high ceilings with stucco works. Breakfast and lunch can be enjoyed in the stylish Spegelsalen Hall, which also serves as a venue for various events. The Bishops Arms Pub serves light meals and a wide selection of beer and whisky. The small relaxation area offers a selection of training equipment and a sauna free for guests’ use. The hotel is an attraction in itself, featuring a stylish marble staircase from 1890. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Stora Torget Square is situated 200 metres from the hotel. Centralen night club is a 3-minute walk away.

name: Profilhotels Savoy
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Jönköping, with the city right outside the doorstep and Lake Vättern 500 metres away. It offers a popular breakfast buffet, a relaxation area and modern rooms with free WiFi. The individually designed rooms of ProfilHotels Savoy include luxury beds, flat-screen TVs and large bathrooms with underfloor heating. In addition, dumbbells are provided in each room. Guests also have free access to a fitness room with sauna. Brasserie Sofiehof offers Swedish specialities as well as international dishes for lunch and dinner. After-work specials and other events are hosted throughout the year. Free tea and coffee is available in the lobby around the clock. Savoy Hotel’s central location offers easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. The Match Museum is a 10-minute walk away, while Jönköping Central Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away. Elmia Congress Centre is within 10 minutes' drive.

name: Best Western Plus Savoy Lulea
description: Offering free spa and gym entrance and a modern restaurant and bar, this hotel is centrally located in Luleå, just 300 metres from Luleå Central Station. The spa includes 2 hot tubs, a steam sauna, a traditional sauna and an ice shower. Guests can also book treatments such as massages and facials. Each room features a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and seating area. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. The restaurant offers a varied á la carte menu based on local Swedish cuisine, open Monday to Saturday. A rich lunch buffet is also served on weekdays. The lobby café is open 24-hours and offers light dishes and beverages. On Saturdays, Hotel Savoy hosts a nightclub as well as live music on occasions. The hotel is 1.4 km from Coop Arena and 400 metres from the cultural centre Kulturens Hus. Kallax Airport is 9 km away.

name: Ad Astra by Elite
description: Located in Södertälje, 220 meters from Tom Tits Experiment, Ad Astra by Elite provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room has a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have river views. The hotel has a spa with both indoor and outdoor pools, a private movie theater and activities on site like shuffleboard and pool game. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet with delicious ingredients catering to all sorts of preferences. Guests can enjoy drinks and pizza by the fountain on the Italian piazza during the summer time. Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre is 28 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 39 km from Ad Astra by Elite.

name: Quality Hotel Grand Boras
description: Situated along the Viskan River in the heart of Boras, the pet-friendly Quality Hotel Grand is only a five minute walk from the Boras Central Station and gives you real value for your hard-earned money. Additional attractions near our smoke-free hotel include the Stadsparksbadet Water Park, Caroli Church, Textile Museum of Boras, Boras Zoo and the Boras Arena. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, a club, free full breakfast, a spa and wellness center, free WiFi, free coffee and meeting space, to name a few. All of our rooms have views of the Boras Centre or City Park. Book a guest room today.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels President
description: ProfilHotels President is 300 metres from Norrköping Central Station. It offers a sauna and free Wi-Fi. The Cactus Park is 200 metres away. All rooms at President Hotel include a work desk, tea/coffee facilities and comfortable Carpe Diem beds. President's lobby bar is a pleasant setting for a relaxing drink. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Relaxation options include a sauna. Drottninggatan shopping street is 5 minutes’ walk away. The Museum of Work is an 8-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Mojo Hotell
description: Set in Örebro and within 300 metres of Örebro Castle, Mojo Hotell features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy city views. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. At Mojo Hotell you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Conventum, Örebro Train Station and Örebro County Museum. The nearest airport is Orebro Airport, 13 km from Mojo Hotell.

name: Hotel Mårtenson
description: Time-honored Hotel Martenson is extensively renovated and reopened to guests in a completely new shape. The hotel is once again a full-service hotel with a great offer within foods and drinks and with an amazing roof top bar. Hotel Martenson is the hot spot in Halmstad whether you are meeting up old friends for a drink, making new acquaintances, celebrating life or simply just longing for a great night sleep. It is a well composed hotel where the 1920s meets the 2020s with a strong and attractive offer to the audience including a gym, co-working area and a top notch service.Choice Hotels

name: Björkbackens Karaktärshotell
description: Just 3 km from Astrid Lindgren World Theme Park, Björkbackens Karaktärshotell offers free parking and rooms with free wired internet. Vimmerby Station is 1.5 km away. A summer water park is also found on site that guests can enjoy for an additional fee. All rooms have a TV, heated bathroom floors and soft, Swedish-made beds. Some rooms are named after historical characters from around Vimmerby. A sauna can be found on site. Children will enjoy the 12-hole minigolf course and playground. BBQ facilities are available in the garden. The large restaurant at Björkbackens serves lunch and is decorated in a charming, typically Smålandian style. Evening meals can be enjoyed in the lobby restaurant.

name: Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna
description: This riverside hotel is 500 metres from Eskilstuna Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, gym and sauna access. All rooms feature flat-screen TVs and minibars. Work desks and wardrobes are standard at Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna. Each room has bright, modern décor. Some include a sofa while some have wooden floors. The British-style Bishop’s Arms bar offers numerous whiskies and craft beers, plus classic pub dishes. The hotel restaurant offers an international à la carte menu. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Elite Eskilstuna is 3 minutes’ walk from shopping, cafés and a cinema. Eskilstuna Art Museum is 1 km away.

name: Vadstena Klosterhotell Konferens & Spa
description: Housed in a former monastery from the Middle Ages, this historic hotel is located on Lake Vättern in quaint Vadstena. Guests can relax with in the peaceful settings or at the on-site spa. It features free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Vadstena Klosterhotell’s classically decorated guest rooms feature cable TV and a separate seating area. Some are located in the monastery building, while others are in a grand 19th-century building. The spa can be accessed for a surcharge and includes hot baths, a sauna, a steam bath and a variety of spa and massage treatments. Guests can also enjoy an outdoor hot tub, a cafe/bar, a relaxation room and a gym. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the neighbouring Vadstena Castle and the town’s idyllic main street. Vadstena Golf Club is 10 minutes’ drive away. Motala Train Station, 17 km away, is the closest stop to the hotel.

name: Billingehus
description: For over fifty years, the iconic hotel has balanced like a monument on Billingen's escarpment. Equal parts of course as the special. Check in with family, love, friends, the training group or why not by yourself, for some well-deserved alone time? Billingehus is the hotel for those looking for warm and welcoming accommodation in Skvde, with closeness to nature and a nice mix of experiences both inside and out.iHotelier/iStay

name: Elite Stadshotellet Luleå
description: Overlooking Stadsparken and the North Harbour, this hotel is situated on Luleå’s main street, Storgatan. It offers free WiFi and gym access and a popular breakfast buffet. All rooms at Elite Stadshotellet Luleå are individually decorated and include a minibar, a work desk and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms feature Italian marble. A wide selection of different whiskies and beers are available at the English-style Bishop Arms Pub. In addition to free gym entrance, guests are welcome to take part in group classes at discounted rates. Other facilities include rental bicycles. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 12:00. Elite Stadshotellet Luleå provides easy access to local transport, with only 100 metres to the nearest bus stop. Luleå Central Station is less than 15 minutes’ walk away. The airport shuttle also stops 300 metres from the hotel.

name: Scandic Mölndal
description: Situated less than 5 minutes’ walk from Mölndal Centrum Tram Stop, guests can reach Gothenburg’s city centre in 15 minutes by car or tram. This hotel offers free WiFi. Classic Scandinavian design with wooden floors and floor-to-ceiling windows are featured in each Scandic Mölndal guest room. Each bright room also has a TV, arm chair and work desk. The glass atrium provides a light and spacious lobby and dining area. Seasonal Swedish cuisine is served in Mölndal Scandic’s contemporary restaurant. Guests can enjoy a stylish bar indoors and an attractive terrace outdoors. Leisure facilities include free access to a gym and relaxation area with a sauna and hot tub. An indoor playroom has toys and games for children. Hotel staff will gladly recommend area activities and attractions, such as Gothenburg’s beautiful archipelago.

name: Nynäs Havsbad
description: This early 1900s property is in Nynäshamn, on Trehörningen Island. It offers spa treatments, panoramic sea views and fine dining. Stockholm city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. Nynäs Havsbad’s modern rooms have a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Modern European cuisine made from seasonal, local produce is served in the restaurant. A set 3-course menu is offered Monday-Thursday, with à la carte options at weekends. The hotel offers pool and sauna facilities for an extra fee. Various treatments are offered at the on-site spa. In the wintertime, it is possible to take a dip in a hole in the ice. Free public parking spaces are found nearby. Nynäs Havsbad Hotel is 1.5 km from Nynäshamn Station, and Nynäshamn Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes’ drive.

name: Scandic Star Sollentuna
description: Located beside Sollentuna Centrum shopping mall, this hotel is only a 15-minute train ride from central Stockholm. Guests enjoy free access to the relaxation area with pool, gym and sauna. Each spacious room at Scandic Star Sollentuna is decorated in warm colours and features a work desk and cable TV. Most rooms have a separate bedroom and living room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel Scandic Sollentuna’s restaurant offers classic Scandinavian cuisine as well as international dishes. Afternoon coffee and evening cocktails can be enjoyed in the lotus shaped bar. For relaxation, guests can visit the on-site Star Spa and try a variety of face and body treatments, including massage, facial treatments and nail care. More active types will find walking and jogging trails nearby. Sollentuna Train Station is only 250 metres away, and Stockholm Arlanda Airport is reached within a 20-minute drive.

name: Elite Plaza Hotel, Örnsköldsvik
description: This central Örnsköldsvik hotel is situated at the Inner Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, an on-site British pub and a top-floor relaxation area with a gym and impressive views. Modern furnishings, wooden floors and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are provided in all Elite Plaza Örnsköldsvik rooms. Some feature a minibar and views over the harbour. On-site dining can be enjoyed at the Bishop's Arms pub and restaurant which also has a waterfront, outdoor terrace open during the summer. On Sundays, guests can enjoy Elite Örnsköldsvik's breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during high season. Örnsköldsvik Central Station is about 5 minutes' walk away, while the E4 Motorway is just 400 metres away from the hotel.

name: Best Western Valhall Park Hotell
description: The Best Western Valhall Park Hotell is a family friendly hotel with a relaxing atmosphere surrounded by fruit trees, Copper Beech trees and historic sites from the bronze age, located in a beautiful and serene Angelholm. The hotel has 70 rooms, restaurant, bar, conference facilities and from June 2021 relax and spa and hotel gym. Our guests praise us for our high quality, locally sourced made from scratch food, where we focus on seasonal ingredients to enhance your culinary experience. The Bjare Peninsula and the countryside of Kulla offers a rich and accessible nature with its beaches, parks, hiking and biking trails, vineyards, local stores and farmers market, shopping, churches, and historical sites, some dated back to the bronze age. Valhall Park offers a peaceful environment where you can collect your thoughts, with its own walking and running paths, paddle lanes, as well as a gym and group exercise activities at Friskis & Svettis. The hotel is located close to the north Atlantic Ocean (1.5 kilometers), with long stretches of white sandy beaches by Skalderviken. The Kattegatt Trail offers excellent biking, walking, and running paths. The hotel has a unique location being close to the Angelholm-Helsinborg Airport, the E6 Interstate, and the train station Barkakra, connected to Halmstad and Helsingborg.bestwestern.com

name: Aurum Hotel
description: Situated next to the E4 highway in Skellefteå, Aurum Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and tastefully decorated rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs. Skellefteå city centre is 1.5 km away. All guest rooms at Aurum Hotel have beds by Lectus and a private bathroom with shower. Most rooms include a seating area. Guests have access to the relax area, featuring an indoor swimming pool, uni-sex sauna and hot tub. Massages can be booked at the in-house Daggdroppen Spa. Other facilities include a pool table and a mini golf course. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Refreshing drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Boda Borg Family Entertainment Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Skellefteå Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Best Western Gustaf Wasa Hotel
description: Welcome to the Best Western Gustaf Wasa Hotel, Borlange's leading hotel best known for quality accommodations and prize winning architecture. Our hotel is located in the heart of Borlange's business district neighboring some of Sweden's largest corporations within the steel, railway and highway sectors. We are also located in the famous tourist region of Dalecarlia which includes other attractions such as Romme Alpin Ski Centre, Falu Copper Mine and Carl Larsson. Our warm professional staff and personal charm will make you feel right at home!bestwestern.com
